Summary: midnight on 10/12/2010 saw objrt in western sky
divs: Sighting Detailsmy daughter was sitting on the step facing the western sky , talking on my cell phone ,when suddenly a yellow huge objecct appeared instantly, hovered for about 3 minutes and then her call dropped so she looked at the phone and back and it had dissappeared
